attributes.action: Action against Ministers who are Negligent
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We at scambusters Petition the Prime Minister, the Government and the population of Great Britain to support our case for the ;

Improvements to the Accountability Rules by making any Minister or Government Official Responsible for Negligence and Incompetence, Reimburse the State to cover the Compensation Paid to the Victims Who have Suffered Hardships as a Result of the Ministers or Government Officials Actions or Inactions, out of their own Estate.

rejection.details: Your organisation's name is still formatted as a URL.
